summary: Secondary Doors Cannot Be Closed After Opening
description: Non-primary doors open normally when interacting with the button using [E] or mouse click. However, once opened, these doors cannot be closed again when pressing the button. Only the main door properly supports both open and close states. This suggests a missing animation or incomplete interaction logic for secondary doors.
steps: 4. Attempt to close the same door using [E] again.
5. Observe that the door remains open.
expected: All interactable doors should support toggling between open and closed states, unless intentionally restricted.
actual: Secondary doors only open; they never close after activation.
